Package com.ibm.service

Class AdminServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.service.AdminServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminService
@Service public class AdminServiceImpl extends Object implements AdminService
Implementation of the AdminService interface that provides methods for admin operations.

    • authenticate

      public String authenticate(String email, String password)
      Authenticates an admin based on the provided email and password. If the authentication is successful, generates and returns an authentication token.
      Specified by:
      authenticate in interface AdminService
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the admin
      password - the password of the admin
      Returns:
      the authentication token if authentication is successful, null otherwise
